message:

breaking: drop out rollup module bundler for context sharing between named imports and default imports (#220)

* chore(jsx-transform): set "runtime" to "classic" so that it will not automaticly import anything

* chore: update yarn.lock

chore: @babel/eslint-parser as the ESLint default parser and bump Next.js to v10 (#276)
